properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:22PM MST until January 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches,
with the heaviest accumulation along the I-15 corridor.

* WHERE...Southwest Utah.

* WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times. Plan on snow
covered and slick roads.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY
